mapper.select: select tf.refer_id, tf.type, tf.money, tf.create_time, tf.user_id,t.url,mt.create_time as accept_time from trade_flow tf,mote_task mt,task t where tf.user_id =#{userId} and mt.task_id= t.id and tf.refer_id=mt.id and tf.type=0 order by tf.id desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}
select ifnull(count(1),0) from trade_flow tf,mote_task mt,task t where tf.user_id =#{userId} and mt.task_id= t.id and tf.refer_id=mt.id and tf.type=0

select tf.refer_id, tf.type, tf.money, tf.create_time, tf.user_id,t.url,mt.create_time as accept_time from trade_flow tf,mote_task mt,task t where tf.user_id =#{userId} and mt.task_id= t.id and tf.refer_id=mt.id and tf.type in (1,2) order by tf.id desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}
select ifnull(count(1),0) from trade_flow tf,mote_task mt,task t where tf.user_id =#{userId} and mt.task_id= t.id and tf.refer_id=mt.id and tf.type in (1,2)
